segments.text: I see two children engaged in a clandestine operation at the kitchen cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is perched precariously on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He has one hand deep inside a jar clearly labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite an elaborate setup just for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of fear watching him; he could easily tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him, with an arm raised, is clearly his accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant, her eyes fixed on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost cute how dedicated they are to their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely absorbed, just like the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt or caught in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thrill of forbidden snacks must be incredibly strong for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an adventure they've cooked up for themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
